t: r/kayakfishing on Reddit: Dakota lithium batteries; worth it or not?

s: Winters in North Dakota can get cold. Up here on the great plains the landscape can be unforgiving – high winds, deep snow, long nights. Dakota Lithium was born out of this rugged landscape. A battery designed to endure. To help you do what you love longer.
